title: Mikan’s Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Kanata-saaan, Kanata-saaan! I came to play-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oooh~, hello, Chika-chan. Welcome~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ehehe~, you see, today is the anniversary that the whole world has been waiting for<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>The anniversary that the world has been waiting for....? The new year is still up ahead so, what day is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Geez~, today is month 11 day 3, it’s “ii mikka n”, so it’s “good mikan’s day”~. Mikan is delicious, so people of the world must’ve been waiting for this very day~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata sees~. The mikan lovers of the world and Chika-chan has been waiting for this day, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah! I’ve been restless since last month~! So, you see, I kind of want you to make a mikan sweet worthy of the good mikan’s day, Kanata-san....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Are you expecting that from me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Totally~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Then, Kanata will do my best~! Kanata will make a delicious one♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
